hadith.text: Abu Umamah bin Sahl reported on the authority of his father:The Messenger of Allah (ï·º) prohibited to accept ja'rur and habiq dates as zakat. Az-Zuhri said: These are two kinds of the dates of Medina. Abu Dawud said: This has also been transmited by Abu al-Walid from Sulaiman bin Kathir from Az-Zuhri
